judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManDERINO, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. See Commonwealth ex rel. Specter v. Moak, 452 Pa. 482, 307 A. 2d 884 (1973).
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Martin Weinberg, City Solicitor of Philadelphia, with him Sheldon L. Albert, Chief Deputy City Solicitor, and Paul L. Rucei, Assistant City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Snyder, Appellant, v. Weinberg.
Argued April 30, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManDERINO, JJ.
James M. Morcm, for appellant.
Martin Weinberg, City Solicitor of Philadelphia, with him Sheldon L. Albert, Chief Deputy City Solicitor, and Paul L. Rucei, Assistant City Solicitor, for appellee.
July 2, 1973:
